resources.string: 50% off the tuition and miscellaneous fee for 4 or 5 years. (Must pass exam given at the Marketing Dept.) Must be in good class standing. No maintaining grade. Applicable during summer if it’s required in the curriculum checklist.
100% off the tuition (21 units only) & must be in good class standing. Service of 4 hours/day at the assigned department. Must have passing grades. Not applicable during summer.

100% discount on tuition & miscellaneous fees for 4 or 5 years & P4,000 monthly allowance for Honors or Top 10 Grade 12 students who pass qualifying exam. Service of 2 hrs/day at assigned department. No grade below 2.0. Average must be 1.75 or above. Applicable during summer if required in the curriculum.

100% discount on tuition & miscellaneous fees for 4 or 5 years & P4,000 monthly allowance for Honors or Top 10 Grade 12 students who pass qualifying exam. Service of 2 hrs/day at assigned department. No grade below 2.0. Average must be 1.75 or above. Applicable during summer if required in the curriculum.

Known as the Universal Access to Quality Tertiary Education Act is “an act promoting universal access to quality tertiary education by providing free tuition and other school fees in State Universities and Colleges, Local Universities and Colleges, and State-Run Technical-Vocational Institutions, establishing the Tertiary Education Subsidy and Student Loan Program, strengthening the Unified Student Financial Assistance System for Tertiary Education, and appropriating fund, therefore,” as stated in the title of the Law.

StuFAPs aims to provide financial assistance to students who are enrolled in authorized public or private Higher Education Institutions (HEIs). This helps to ensure that education shall be accessible to all especially to underprivileged and deserving students. Qualified beneficiaries shall enroll or must be currently enrolled in any CHED priority courses as per CMO No. 1 s. 2104 and shall receive financial assistance amounting to Php 15,000 to Php 30,000 per semester whichever program an applicant qualifies.

The scholarship aims to give back to those who are serving in the government. 25% discount on Tuition Fee.Minimum Qualifications: Strictly for Filipinos only, Child of government employees, Incoming College,Any gender,For any marital status.
After you submit please wait for further announcements. Thankyou!
If you have concerns, visits the University of Pangasinan page.
Submit your document to csdl office, and please wait for further announcement. Thankyou!
